name: Web Search Agent
description: Brave and Google search integration with result parsing
longDescription: A lightweight web search agent that normalizes results across providers, extracts titles and snippets, and streams structured metadata back to your miner.
author: Chutes Team

reviews.author: Miner-12
reviews.comment: Saved me hours of manual crawling. Clean API.

name: Deep Research Node
longDescription: Chains multiple search runs, clusters sources, and emits a ranked synthesis so miners can cite structured evidence.
author: Chutes Team
integrationExample:
# In your Janus implementation
from janus_components import DeepResearchNode

node = DeepResearchNode()
report = await node.run("compare open-source LLM eval suites")

reviews.author: Miner-06
reviews.comment: High quality summaries, great for long-form answers.

name: Code Sandbox
description: Secure code execution in Firecracker VMs via Sandy
longDescription: Isolated execution layer that spins up short-lived Firecracker microVMs for code evaluation, sandboxed tooling, and file output.
author: Chutes Team
integrationExample:
# In your Janus implementation
from janus_components import CodeSandbox

sandbox = CodeSandbox()
result = await sandbox.run_python("print(2 + 2)")

reviews.author: Miner-04
reviews.comment: Stable sandboxes with predictable cold start times.

name: Browser Automation
longDescription: Drives headless Chrome sessions for scraping, form filling, and UI automation with strict request throttling.
author: Chutes Team
integrationExample:
# In your Janus implementation
from janus_components import BrowserAutomation

browser = BrowserAutomation()
await browser.open_page("https://example.com")

reviews.author: Miner-19
reviews.comment: Great for filling complex forms and capturing screenshots.

name: Vector Memory
description: Persistent vector store for conversation context
longDescription: Drops in a managed vector index with fast similarity search so miners can persist and retrieve long-term memories.
author: Community
integrationExample:
# In your Janus implementation
from janus_components import VectorMemory

memory = VectorMemory()
await memory.upsert("session-123", "summary text")

name: Model Router
description: Intelligent routing between Chutes models based on task
longDescription: Scores requests and routes to the best-fit model based on latency, quality targets, and reward constraints.
author: Community
integrationExample:
# In your Janus implementation
from janus_components import ModelRouter

router = ModelRouter()
model = await router.pick_model("complex reasoning")

name: YouTube Downloader
longDescription: Fetches YouTube videos, extracts audio, and returns transcripts with timestamps for downstream summarization.
author: Squad API
integrationExample:
# In your Janus implementation
from janus_components import YouTubeDownloader

media = YouTubeDownloader()
transcript = await media.transcribe("https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ")

name: Twitter X Poster
description: Post to Twitter X (requires API key)
longDescription: Automates posting to X with rate limits, formatting helpers, and safe-guarded content checks.
author: Squad API
integrationExample:
# In your Janus implementation
from janus_components import TwitterPoster

poster = TwitterPoster()
await poster.post("Shipping a new Janus build today")

reviews.author: Miner-02
reviews.comment: Easy posting flow, just bring your own API key.
